description: The function is vulnerable to multiple types of attacks. It does not sanitize or validate user inputs, making it susceptible to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) and SQL Injection attacks. It also does not implement any form of CSRF tokens, making it vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF). Additionally, the function does not validate or sanitize data retrieved from the server, making it susceptible to Improper Input Validation.
